title: frankbitcoin
author: frankbitcoin
content: This is the original 'The Times' newspaper released as the 10th year anniversary for the January 2009 version.It is in fantastic condition and has not been bent.  Will ship flat, signature required for delivery.Folks previously asked if I'd do an auction style so that we can be the first ones to determine the value of this so lets do it!Starting Price:  0.005 BTCBid Increments:  0.001 BTCNO RESERVEAuction End Date:  Saturday, August 13th, 7 PM ESTSniping:  No, any bids made in the last ten minutes of the auction extend the bidding an additional ten minutes until no further bids are made.Shipping:  Will ship flat and protected with cardboard and bubble wrapped.  Signature required for delivery.  Domestic delivery is probably around $30 with international probably being $50 (based on box size, value, signature, etc etc).Happy bidding.https://imgur.com/a/7T0JyYVhttps://imgur.com/a/AcR2XsLhttps://imgur.com/a/YsQZWEB
